description: Diagnostic and feedback tool for Cloudflare's WARP service. See also: warp-cli. More information: https://developers.cloudflare.com/warp-client/.

useCases.description: Generate a Zip file with information about the system configuration and the WARP connection:
Generate a Zip file with debug information including a timestamp to the output filename:
Save the output file under a specific directory:
Submit a new feedback to Cloudflare's WARP interactively:
